# Changelog

## [2.0.0] - 2025-02-01

### Added

- Feature with `code blocks`
- Feature with **bold** text
- Feature with [links](https://example.com)

### Changed

- Modified behavior for special chars: $, %, &, @

### Security

- Fixed XSS vulnerability in `render()` function

## [1.9.0] - 2025-01-30

### Added

- Previous version content
